title: Man, 76, remanded over 'drug-laced sweets' at summer camp - BBC News
analysis: The main headline of the news article is "Israel-Gaza conflict: U.N. Security Council to hold emergency meeting". The key points include the conflict between Israel and Gaza, the U.N. Security Council's decision to hold an emergency meeting, and the potential impact of the conflict on the region. The summary is that the U.N. Security Council is set to discuss the escalating conflict between Israel and Gaza, as the situation warrants an emergency meeting to address the potential consequences of the conflict.
